clues.text: Scientists map human genome; Elian Gonzalez returned to Cuba
Grace Kelly marries a prince; Eisenhower reelected

Federal building bombed in Oklahoma City; Kobe, Japan struck by 7.2 earthquake
John Paul II shot; Iran releases U.S. embassy hostages

rounds.text: Named for the region in Uganda where it was discovered in 1937, it was first detected in the U.S. in 1999
rounds.response: West Nile Virus (or West Nile Fever)
